headline: Veralto Announces Increase in Quarterly Dividend
summary: Veralto (NYSE: VLTO), a global leader in essential water and product quality solutions dedicated to Safeguarding the World's Most Vital Resources™, announced today that its board of directors has approved a 22% increase to its quarterly cash dividend, and accordingly approved a quarterly cash dividend of $0.11 per share of its common stock, payable on January 31, 2025 to holders of record as of the close of business on December 31, 2024.
